name: oc-anthropic-multi-account
description: OpenCode plugin for managing multiple Anthropic Max accounts with automatic failover based on rate limit utilization

scripts.build: bun build src/index.mjs --outfile dist/index.js --format esm --target node && bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --format esm --target bun
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build

author: gaboe
